text: Alexander Schmid (born 9 June 1994) is a German World Cup alpine ski racer, and specializes in giant slalom. Born in Oberstdorf, Bavaria, he competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics and 2019 World Championships. ==World Cup results== ===Season standings=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" |- !
